name: 李仕宇
objective:
先修課程：程式撰寫及負責教授同意。本課程將介紹智慧型控制的相關理論、方法及設計，並實質應用於物理及工程的系統，讓同學體驗與實際操作不同智慧型控制策略所展現之控制效能與使用時機。

In this course, the domain knowledge of intelligent control is introduced, where some of the physical or engineering systems are illustrated for students to further design the related controllers, and to investigate the performance of each intelligent control strategies.
schedule:
Introduction of Intelligent Control
Introducing Physical or Engineering Systems for Intelligent Control
Analysis of Control Systems: Time Histories, Phase Portrait
Analysis of Control Systems: Bifurcation, Fractal
Analysis of Control Systems: Lyapunov Exponents
Stability Theory and Analysis of Control Systems
Intelligent Control Strategies－Adaptive Control
Intelligent Control Strategies－Backstepping Control
Intelligent Control Strategies－Sliding Mode Control
Intelligent Control Strategies－Fuzzy logic theory and fuzzy Control
Intelligent Control Strategies－Fuzzy logic Control System
Intelligent Control Strategies－Neural Networks
Intelligent Control Strategies－Fuzzy Neural Networks Control System
Intelligent Control Strategies－Genetic Algorithm
Final Project Reports
